<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 16"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Frost Brand](/Equipment.aspx?ID=387)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Cold" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=27" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 601 <sup>4.0</sup>

**Price** 10,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 2 hands

**Bulk** 2
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Weapon** [Greatsword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=24)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

The blade of this _+2 greater striking [greater frost](/Equipment.aspx?ID=296) [greatsword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=24)_ appears to be nothing but icy shards. The _frost brand_ automatically extinguishes non-magical fires in a 20-foot emanation. While wielding it, you gain fire resistance 5.

**Activate** <actions string="Two Actions" /> command, Interact;     **Effect** You swing the _frost brand_ into the area of an ongoing magical fire, and the blade attempts to [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) the fire with a counteract modifier of +27. If it fails, it can't attempt to counteract the same fire again.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Frost Brand
